entry.title: WIND WARNING, Slave Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:22 p.m. MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 60 gusting to 90 late this evening then southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
